attributes.action: Make it compulsory that a helmet is worn when riding a push bike
attributes.additional_details: I was knocked off my bike by a moving car whilst not wearing a helmet. I'm lucky to be alive but this isn't always the case you can get serious injuries from just falling off a push bike
attributes.background:
With many accidents not necessarily resulting In death but in serious injuries when riding a push bike. It should be made compulsory to wear a helmet.

http://www.bhsi.org/stats.htm
